SA20sthtvbhu:5: tathā hy ātmadṛṣṭiprabhavā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhaś ca satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣatvāt tatprahāṇāya pravartamānaḥ sarvakleśān prajahāti /
SA20sthtvbhu:8: kleśā hi mokṣaprāpter āvaraṇam iti atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu mokṣo 'dhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:9: jñeyāvaraṇam api sarvasmin jñeye jñānapravṛttipratibandhabhūtam akliṣṭam ajñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:10: tasmin prahīṇe sarvākāre jñeye 'saktam apratihatañ ca jñānaṃ pravartata ity ataḥ sarvajñatvam adhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:11: atha vā dharmapudgalābhiniviṣṭāś cittamātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānantīty ato dharmapudgalanairātmyapradarśanena saphale vijñaptimātre 'nupūrveṇa praveśārthaṃ prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:12: atha vā vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata eveti kecin manyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:13: vijñeyavad vijñānam api saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata ity asya dviprakārasyāpy ekāntavādasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ prakaraṇārambhaḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:22: ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ity evamādiko dharmopacāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:23: ayaṃ dviprakāro 'py upacāro vijñānapariṇāma eva na mukhye ātmani dharmeṣu ceti /
SA20sthtvbhu:25: dharmāṇām ātmanaś ca vijñānapariṇāmād bahir abhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:29: tatrātmādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣād rūpādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣāc cālayavijñānād ātmādinirbhāso vikalpo rūpādinirbhāsaś cotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:30: [Tvbh_42] tam ātmādinirbhāsaṃ rūpādinirbhāsañ ca tasmād vikalpād bahirbhūtam ivopādāyātmādyupacāro rūpādidharmopacāraś cānādikālikaḥ pravartate vināpi bāhyenātmanā dharmaiś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:32: yac ca yatra nāsti tat tatropacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:34: evaṃ vijñānasvarūpe bahiś cātmadharmābhāvāt parikalpita evātmā dharmāś ca na tu paramārthataḥ santīti vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata evety ayam ekāntavādo nābhyupeyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:35: upacārasya ca nirādhārasyāsaṃbhavād avaśyaṃ vijñānapariṇāmo vastuto 'stīty upagantavyo yatrātmadharmopacāraḥ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:36: ataś cāyam abhyupagamo na yuktikṣamo vijñānam api vijñeyavat saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:37: saṃvṛtito 'py abhāvaprasaṅgān na hi saṃvṛtir nirupādānā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:38: tasmād ayam ekāntavādo dviprakāro 'pi niryuktikatvāt tyājya ity ācāryavacanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:39: evañ ca sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvatvād vastuto na vidyate vijñānaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād dravyato 'stīty abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:41: katham etad gamyate vinā bāhyenārthena vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:42: bāhyo hy arthaḥ svābhāsavijñānajanakatvena vijñānasyālambanapratyaya iṣyate na kāraṇatvamātreṇa samanantarādipratyayād viśeṣāprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:45: na ca sañcitam avayavasaṃhatimātrād anyad vidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:47: tasmād vinaiva bāhyenārthena vijñānaṃ sañcitākāram utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:48: na ca paramāṇava eva saṃcitās tasyālambanaṃ paramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:49: na hy asañcitāvasthātaḥ sañcitāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kaścid ātmātiśayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:50: tasmād asañcitavat sañcitā api paramāṇavo naivālambanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:52: ekaika paramāṇur anyanirapekṣyo 'tīndriyo bahavas tu parasparāpekṣā indriyagrāhyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:53: teṣām api sāpekṣanirapekṣāvasthayor ātmātiśayābhāvād ekāntenendriyagrāhyatvam atīndriyatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:54: yadi ca paramāṇava eva parasparāpekṣā vijñānasya viṣayībhavanti /
SA20sthtvbhu:55: evaṃ sati yo 'yaṃ ghaṭakuḍyādyākārabhedo vijñāne sa na syāt praramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:57: na ca paramāṇavaḥ stambhādivat paramārthataḥ santy/
SA20sthtvbhu:59: tadanabhyupagame vā pūrvadakṣiṇāparottarādidigbhedo yaḥ sa paramāṇor na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:60: tataś ca vijñānavat paramāṇor apy amūrtatvam adeśasthatvañ ca prasajyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:61: evaṃ bāhyārthābhāvād vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyate svapnavijñānavad ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:63: na ca vartamānā vartamānajanakā utpadyamānāvasthāyām asattvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:64: [Tvbh_46] utpannāvasthāyāṃ vijñānasyāpi tadākāreṇotpannatvān na kiñcit kartavyam astīti manovijñānam apy anālambanam evotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:66: asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:67: upacāro hi triṣu satsu bhavati nānyatamābhāve mukhyapadārthe tatsadṛśe 'nyasmin viṣaye tayoś ca sādṛśye /
SA20sthtvbhu:68: tad yathā mukhye 'gnau tatsadṛśe ca māṇavake tayoś ca sādhāraṇe dharme kapilatve tīkṣṇatve vā saty agnir māṇavaka ity upacāraḥ kriyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:69: atra hy agnir māṇavaka iti jātir dravyaṃ vopacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:71: tatra tāvan na jāteḥ sādhāraṇaṃ kapilatvaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:72: na ca sādhāraṇadharmābhāve māṇavake jāter upacāro yujyate 'tiprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:75: jātyabhāve 'pi tīkṣṇatvakapilatvayor māṇavake darśanād avinābhāvitvam ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:79: na hi yo 'gnes tīkṣṇo guṇaḥ kapilo vā sa eva māṇavake /
SA20sthtvbhu:81: viśeṣasya svāśrayapratibaddhatvān na vināgniguṇenāgner māṇavake upacāro yuktaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:83: evam apy agniguṇasyaiva tīkṣṇasya kapilasya vā māṇavakaguṇe tīkṣṇe kapile vā sādṛśyād upacāro yukto na tu māṇavake 'gner guṇasādṛśyenāsaṃbandhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:87: pradhāne hi guṇarūpeṇaiva jñānābhidhāne pravartete tatsvarūpāsaṃsparśāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:89: na hi jñānābhidhānavyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārthasvarūpaparicchittyupāyo 'stīty ataḥ pradhānasvarūpaviṣayajñānābhidhānābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'stīty avagantavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:90: evaṃ yāvac chabde saṃbandhābhāvāj jñānābhidhānābhāva evañ cābhidhānābhidheyābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:91: api ca sarva evāyaṃ gauṇa eva na mukhyo 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:92: gauṇo hi nāma yo yatrāvidyamānena rūpeṇa pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:93: sarvaś ca śabdaḥ pradhāne 'vidyamānenaiva guṇarūpeṇa pravartate ato mukhyo nāsty eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:94: tatra yad uktaṃ asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yukta iti tad ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:95: vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kati prabheda iti na jñāyate / atas tatprabhedopadarśanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:97: yatrātmādyupacāro dharmopacāraś ca sa punar hetubhāvena phalabhāvena ca bhidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:99: phalapariṇāmaḥ punar vipākavāsanāvṛttilābhād ālayavijñānasya pūrvakarmākṣepaparisamāptau yā nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:100: niṣyandavāsanāvṛttilābhāc ca yā pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manasa ālayavijñānād abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:101: tatra pravṛttivijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalam ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāñ cādhatte /
SA20sthtvbhu:102: avyākṛtaṃ kliṣṭañ ca mano niṣyandavāsanām eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:104: yo 'sau trividhaḥ pariṇāma ukto 'sāv api na jñāyate / atas tadbhedapradarśanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:105: vipāko mananākhyaś ca vijñaptir viṣayasya ca / 2ab
SA20sthtvbhu:107: sa eṣa trividhaḥ pariṇāmo vipākākhyo mananākhyo viṣayavijñaptyākhyaś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:111: tatsvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na tat pratīyate ity ato yasya yat svarūpaṃ tad yathākramaṃ pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:115: ālayākhyam ity ālayavijñānasaṃjñakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ sa vipākapariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:118: atha vālīyante upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥ kāryabhāvena tad vālīyate upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:122: yadi pravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānam asti tato 'syālambanam ākāro vā vaktavyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:123: na hi nirālambanaṃ nirākāraṃ vā vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:129: tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:132: asaṃviditaka upādir yasmin asaṃviditakā ca sthānavijñaptir yasmin tad ālayavijñānam asaṃviditakopādisthānavijñaptikam /
SA20sthtvbhu:135: tatsadbhāvād ālayavijñānenātmādivikalpo rūpādivikalpaś ca kāryatvenopātta iti tad vāsanātmādivikalpānāṃ rūpādivikalpānāñ copādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:136: so 'sminn idaṃ tad iti pratisaṃvedanākāreṇāsaṃvidita ity atas tad asaṃviditakopādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:138: āśraya ātmabhāvaḥ sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:139: tasya punar yad upādānam upagamanam ekayogakṣematvena tad upādiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:141: ārūpyadhātau tu rūpavītarāgatvād rūpavipākānabhinirvṛtter nāmopādānam eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:142: kin tu vāsanāvastham eva tatra rūpaṃ na vipākāvastham /
SA20sthtvbhu:143: tat punar upādānam idantayā pratisaṃvedayitum aśakyam ity ato 'saṃvidita ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:149: na ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu vijñānaṃ naivāstīti śakyate pratipattum /
SA20sthtvbhu:152: ity uktaṃ vijñānañ cāvaśyaṃ caittaiḥ saṃprayuktam ity ato vaktavyaṃ katamaiḥ katibhiś ca tebhyaḥ saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:153: tathā kiṃ taiḥ sarvadā saṃprayujyate / uta nety ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:156: sadeti yāvad ālayavijñānaṃ tāvad ebhiḥ sparśamanaskāravedanāsaṃjñācetanākhyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvatragair dharmair anvitam / vedanā vit /
SA20sthtvbhu:161: tasmin sati tatsamakālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlo yo vikāras tena [Tvbh_56] sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:162: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:163: sparśaḥ punar indriyavikārasādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśa ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:166: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ veditam iti vistaraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:171: cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaś cittasyāvarjanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:172: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktaṃ na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tasya hi pratikṣaṇam eva vyāpāro na kṣaṇāntare /
SA20sthtvbhu:178: śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:185: tatra sukho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punaḥ saṃyogecchā jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:186: duḥkho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punar asaṃyogecchā /
SA20sthtvbhu:187: aduḥkhāsukho yasminn utpanne niruddhe cobhyaṃ na jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:191: tasyodgrahaṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nīlam etan na pītam iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:193: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manasaś ceṣṭā yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspanda iva bhavaty ayaskāntavaśād ayaḥpraspandavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:194: vedanā trividhā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:195: dharmāś catuḥ prakārāḥ kuśalā akuśalā anivṛtāvyākṛtā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:196: tatrālayavijñāne vid iti sāmānyopadeśena na vijñāyate tisṝṇāṃ vedanānāṃ katamā vedanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:197: tathā tad api kiṃ kuśalam akuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti na vijñāyata ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:200: upekṣaivālayavijñāne vedanā na sukhā na duḥkhā tayoḥ paricchinnālambanākāratvād rāgadveṣānuśayitatvāc ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:209_0: yathālayavijñānam ekāntena vipāko 'paricchinnālambanākāraṃ sadā sparśādibhir anvitaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:209_1: tatra copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtañ ca tathā sparśādayo 'py ekāntena vipākā evāparicchinnālambanākārāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:210: ātmānaṃ hitvetaraiś caturbhir ālayavijñānena ca nityam anugatās teṣu copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtāś cālayavijñānavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:211: na hi vipākena saṃprayuktānām avipākatvam aparicchinnālambanākāreṇa ca paricchinnālambanākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:213: kiṃ punas tad ālayavijñānam ekam abhinnam āsaṃsāram anuvartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:215: na hi tad ekam abhinnam anuvartate kṣaṇikatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:220: udakasamūhasya pūrvāparabhāgāvicchedena pravāha ogha ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:221_0: yathā hy oghas tṛṇakāṣṭhagomayādīn ākarṣayaṅ gacchaty evam ālayavijñānam api puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyakarmavāsanānugataṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:221_1: sparśamanaskārādīn ākarṣan srotasāsaṃsāram avyuparataṃ pravartata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:222: tasyaivaṃ śrotasā pravṛttasya kasyām avasthāyāṃ vyāvṛttir ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:226: kasya punar yogād arhann ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:228: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyām ālayavijñānāśritadauṣṭhulyaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ālayavijñānaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:234: tatra yathā cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ cakṣurādaya āśrayatvena rūpādayaś cālambanatvena prasiddhā naiva kliṣṭasya manasa āśraya ālambanaṃ vā prasiddham /
SA20sthtvbhu:235: na ca vijñānam āśrayālambananirapekṣaṃ yujyata ity ataḥ kliṣṭasya manasa āśrayālambanapratipādanārthaṃ niruktipratipādanārthañ cāha /
SA20sthtvbhu:238: tad āśritya pravartata iti tacchabdenālayavijñānam abhisaṃbadhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:239: tadvāsanāśrayo hy ālayavijñānam atas tad āśritya pravartate santānenotpadyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:240: atha vā yasmin dhātau bhūmau vālayavijñānaṃ vipākas tad api kliṣṭaṃ manas taddhātukaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ ceti tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt tad āśritya pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:241: tadālambam ity ālayavijñānālambanam eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saṃprayogād ahaṃ mamety ālayavijñānālambanatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:242: kathaṃ punar yata eva cittād utpadyate tad eva tadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:243: yathā tad anicchatāṃ keṣāṃcit kasyāñcid avasthāyāṃ yata eva cittān manovijñānam utpadyate tadālambanam eva tad utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:244: manonāma vijñānam iti mana iti nāma ākhyā yasya vijñānasya tad ālayavijñānam āśritya pravarte tadālambanaṃ ca manonāmety anenālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānāc ca vyavacchinatti /
SA20sthtvbhu:245: tat punaḥ kiṃ svabhāvam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:247: evaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate nairūktena vidhinā /
SA20sthtvbhu:250: idaṃ tu na jñāyate katamais tac caittaiḥ kiyadbhiḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vā saṃprayujyata ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:252: caittā hi dviprakārāḥ kleśās tad anye ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:255: na ca taiḥ saṃprayujyate 'taś caturbhir ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:260: na hi nivṛtena vijñānenākuśalānāṃ saṃprayogaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:264: yāvat tad asti tāvat taiḥ saṃprayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:265: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣato na jñāyanta iti viśeṣato nirdiśati /
SA20sthtvbhu:267: upādānaskandheṣv ātmeti darśanam ātmadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:272: tatrālayavijñānasvarūpe saṃmūḍhaḥ sann ālayavijñāne ātmadṛṣṭim utpādayati /
SA20sthtvbhu:274: etasmiṃs traye saty ātmābhimate vastuni yo 'bhiṣvaṅgaḥ sa ātmasnehaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:279: viparyāsanimittaṃ tu manaḥ kliṣṭaṃ sadaiva tat /
SA20sthtvbhu:281: ete hy ātmamohādayaḥ kleśā manovan navabhūmikāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:282: iha ca sāmānyenābhidhānān na jñāyate kiṃ svabhūmikair eva saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:287: tanmayair iti yatra dhātau bhūmau vā jātas taddhātukais tadbhūmikair eva ca saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:289: kiṃ punaś caturbhir eva kleśaiḥ saṃprayujyate / nety āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:294: ete hi pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragatvāt sarvavijñānaiḥ saṃprayujyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:295: etair api yatra jātas tanmayair eva saṃprayujyate nānyadhātubhūmikaiḥ /

SA20sthtvbhu:670: kiṃ pañcānāñ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhye 'py ālayavijñānād ekasyaivotpattir bhavati na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā /

SA20sthtvbhu:673: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ bahūnāṃ samantarapratyayatvaṃ pratipattum utsahate / utāniyamena /
SA20sthtvbhu:675: evaṃ dvayor bahūnāñ ca pratyayasāṃnidhye utpattir bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:677: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale // 15

SA20sthtvbhu:680: yathāpratyayam udbhava iti yasya yasya yaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃnihitas tasya tasya niyamenodbhava ātmalābhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:681: saha na veti yugapat krameṇa vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:682: taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jala ity ālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānānāṃ yugapad ayugapac cotpattau dṛṣṭāntaḥ / yathoktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:683: tadyathā viśālamate mahata udakaughasya vahataḥ saced ekasya
SA20sthtvbhu:685: taraṅgaṃ pravartate / saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:687: saṃbahulāni taraṅgāṇi pravartante / na ca tasyodakaughasya srotasā
SA20sthtvbhu:688: vahataḥ samucchittir bhavati / na paryupayogaḥ prajñāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:689: evam eva viśālamate tadoghasthānīyam ālayavijñānaṃ saṃniśritya
SA20sthtvbhu:691: pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:692: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ sacet pañcānāṃ vijñānānām utpattipratyayaḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:693: pratyupasthito bhavati sakṛd yāvat pañcānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:696: ādānavijñāna gabhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījo /
SA20sthtvbhu:697: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśi mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyur
SA20sthtvbhu:701: ata ekasmād api samanantarapratyayād ālambanapratyayasānnidhye dvayor bahūnāṃ vā vijñānānām utpattir na virūdhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:703: pañcānāñ ca yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhya ekenaivotpattavyaṃ na pañcabhir apīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:704: tasmād alambanasadbhāve pañcānām api cotpattir ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:706: kiṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha pravartate vinā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:711: sarvadeti sarvakālaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha vinā cety arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:714: samāpattidvayān middhān mūrcchanād apy acittakād iti / (16bd)
SA20sthtvbhu:715: tatrāsaṃjñikam asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasya yaś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:719: tṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgasyordhvam avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa manovijñānasya tatsaṃprayuktānāñ ca caittānāṃ yo nirodhaḥ so 'trāsaṃjñisamāpattir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:723: sa ca samāpatticittād anantarañ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayaḥ prāpyata iti samāpattir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:724: nirodhasamāpattir ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa sasaṃprayogasya manovijñānasya kliṣṭasya ca manaso yo nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:726: acittakaṃ middhaṃ gāḍhamiddhopahatatvād āśrayasya tāvatkālaṃ manovijñānāpravṛtter acittakam ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:727: acittikā mūrcchā / āgantukenābhighātena vātapittaśleṣmavaiṣamyeṇa vā yad āśrayavaiṣamyaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:729: etāḥ pañcāvasthā varjayitvā tadanyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu manovijñānapravṛttir veditavyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:730: evam āsaṃjñikādiṣu manovijñāne niruddhe tadapagame punaḥ kuta utpadyate yatas tasya kālakriyā na bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:733: yatra vijñānapariṇāme ātmadharmopacāraḥ sa punas tridhety uddiśya vistareṇa trividho 'pi nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:735: idānīm ātmadharmopacāro yaḥ pravartate sa vijñānapariṇāma eva na vijñānapariṇāmāc ca pṛthag asty ātmā dharmā ceti yat pratijñātaṃ tatprasādhanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:737: tena tan nāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñāptimātrakam // 17
SA20sthtvbhu:739: yo 'yaṃ vijñānapariṇāmas trividho 'nantaram abhihitaḥ so 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:740: adhyāropitārthākārās traidhātukāś cittacaittā vikalpa ucyate / yathoktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:742: tena trividhena vikalpenālayavijñānakliṣṭamanaḥpravṛttivijñānasvabhāvena sasaṃprayogeṇa yad vikalpyate bhājanam ātmāskandhadhātvāyatanarūpaśabdādikaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:743: vastu tan nāstīty ataḥ sa vijñānapariṇāmo vikalpa ucyate / asadālambanatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:744: kathaṃ punar etad vijñāyate tadālambanam asad iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:745: yad dhi yasya kāraṇaṃ tasmin samagre cāviruddhe ca tad utpadyate nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:746: vijñānañ ca māyāgandharvanagarasvapnatimirādāv asaty apyālambane jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:747: yadi ca vijñānasyālambanapratibaddha utpādaḥ syād evaṃ sati māyādiṣv arthābhāvān na vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:749: tasmāt pūrvakān niruddhāt tajjātīyavijñānād vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:750: na bāhyād arthāt tasminn asaty api bhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:751: dṛṣṭā cābhinne 'py arthe pratipattṝṇāṃ parasparaviruddhā pratipattiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:753: tasmād adhyāropitarūpatvād vikalpasyālambanam asad iti pratipattavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:758: yasmāt pariṇāmātmakena vikalpena yad vikalpyate tena tan nāsti tasmād viṣayābhāvāt sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam /
SA20sthtvbhu:762: yadi sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam eva na tato 'nyaḥ kartā karaṇaṃ vāsti kathaṃ mūlavijñānād anadhiṣṭhitād asati karaṇe vikalpāḥ pravartanta ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:763: sarvabījaṃ hi vijñānaṃ pariṇāmas tathā tathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:764: yāty anyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate // 18
SA20sthtvbhu:765: tatra sarvadharmotpādanaśaktyanugamāt sarvabījaṃ vijñānam ity ālayavijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:766: vijñānaṃ hy asarvabījam apy astīty ataḥ sarvabījam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:767: vijñānād anyad api kaiścit pradhānādi sarvabījaṃ kalpyata iti vijñānam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:770: pariṇāmas tathā tathā yāty anyonyavaśād iti / (18bc)
SA20sthtvbhu:772: tathā tatheti tasya tasya vikalpasyānantarotpādanasamarthāvasthāṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:775: tathā hi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ svaśaktiparipoṣe vartamāne śaktiviśiṣṭasyālayavijñānapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ so 'pi ālayavijñānapariṇāmaś cakṣurādivijñānasya nimittaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:776: evam anyonyavaśād yasmād ubhayaṃ pravartate tasmād ālayavijñānād anyenānadhiṣṭhitād anekaprakāro vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:777: tatra ca vartamāne janmani yathālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānasyotpattir bhavati tathākhyātam /
SA20sthtvbhu:778: idānīṃ vijñaptimātre anāgataṃ janma vartamānajanmanirodhe sati yathā pratisaṃdhīyate tat pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:783: tena karmaṇā yad anāgatātmabhāvābhinirvṛttaye ālayavijñāne sāmarthyam āhitaṃ sā karmavāsanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:785: tatra vijñānāt pṛthag eva svasantānādhyāsitaṃ grāhyam astīty adhyavasāyo grāhyagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:786: tac ca vijñānena pratīyate vijñāyate gṛhyata iti yo 'yaṃ niścayaḥ sa grahakagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:790: grāhadvayavāsanā tu sarvakarmavāsanānāṃ yathāsvam ākṣiptātmabhāvotpādane pravṛttānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:792: evañ ca na kevalāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanānanugṛhītā vipākañ janayantīty uktaṃ bhavati /

SA20sthtvbhu:796_1: paryantāvasthite yathābalaṃ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitā upabhūktād vipākād
SA20sthtvbhu:798: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāka ity anena śāśvatāntaṃ pariharati /
SA20sthtvbhu:801: tad eva ca sarvabījakaṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam iti kuta etat /
SA20sthtvbhu:806: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca //
SA20sthtvbhu:807: na cālayavijñānam antareṇa saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttir vā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:810: tatrālayavijñānād anyat saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:812: saṃsārasyālayavijñānānabhyupagame pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:813_0: tatra ye saṃskārāḥ prātisaṃdhikavijñānapratyayatveneṣyante teṣāñ ciraniruddhatvān
SA20sthtvbhu:813_1: niruddhasya cāsatvād asataś ca pratyayatvābhāvān na saṃskārapratyayaṃ pratisandhivijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:814: pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam apy asti na kevalaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:815: tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayaṃ na nāmarūpam iti kā tatra yuktiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:819: yad uttarakālam iti cet tasya prātisandhikanāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
SA20sthtvbhu:821: ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena /
SA20sthtvbhu:824: saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyā api na saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:826: na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā svātmany ādhātuṃ samarthaṃ svātmani kāritravirodhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:830: acittikāsu ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasaṃbhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:832: evaṃ yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:833: tataś ca saṃsārapravṛttir eva na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:834: tasmād avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārās tadadhivāsitañ cālayavijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:835: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau nāmarūpam ity eṣaiva nītir anavadyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:836: saṃsāranivṛttir api ālayavijñāne asati na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:837: saṃsārasya hi karmakleśāś ca kāraṇaṃ tayoś ca kleśāḥ pradhānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:838: tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:839: tathākṣiptapunarbhavo 'pi karma kleśādhipatyād eva punarbhavo bhavati nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:840: evañ ca kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtteḥ pradhānatvān mūlam /
SA20sthtvbhu:841: atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu saṃsāro vinivartate nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:845: saṃmukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyate bījāvastho vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:846: tatra saṃmukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:848: na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatra kleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta /
SA20sthtvbhu:850: na hi tat kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo bhavitum arhati /
SA20sthtvbhu:852: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūbhiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:853_0: ye punaś cittata eva saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ vāsanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:853_1: pravartante teṣāñ cālayavijñānavyavasthitaṃ bījaṃ tatsahabhuvā kleśapratipakṣamārgeṇāpanīyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:854: tasmiṃś cāpanīte na punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām utpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:856: na hi karma vidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt punarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃ samartham /
SA20sthtvbhu:857_0: evam ālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca nānyathety avaśyaṃ cakṣurādivijñānavyatiriktam
SA20sthtvbhu:857_1: ālayavijñānaṃ tad eva ca sarvadharmabījānugataṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam ity abhyupagantavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:860: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kathaṃ na sūtravirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:861: sūtreṣu hi trayaḥ svabhāvā uktāḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:863: eva sati svabhāvatrayavyavasthānāt / katham ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:864: yena yena vikalpena yad yad vastu vikalpyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:865: parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na sa vidyate // 20
SA20sthtvbhu:866: ādhyātmikabāhyavikalpyavastubhedena vikalpānām ānantyaṃ pradarśayann āha / yena yena vikalpeneti /
SA20sthtvbhu:868: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vāntaśo yāvad buddhadharmā api /
SA20sthtvbhu:872: yad vastu vikalpyaviṣayas tad yasmāt sattābhāvān na vidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:875: tathā hy ekasmin vastuni tadabhāve ca parasparaviruddhānekavikalpapravṛttir dṛṣṭā /
SA20sthtvbhu:876: na ca tad ekaṃ vastu tadabhāvo vā parasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvo yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:877: tasmāt sarvam idaṃ vikalpamātram eva tadarthasya parikalpitarūpatvāt / uktaṃ ca sūtre /
SA20sthtvbhu:878: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmās tathā vidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:879: parikalpitānantaraṃ paratantrasvabhāvo vaktavya iti / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:881: atra ca vikalpa iti paratantrasvarūpam āha / pratyayodbhava ity anenāpi
SA20sthtvbhu:887: parair hetupratyayais tantryata iti paratantra utpādyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:891: niṣpannas tasya pūrveṇa sadā rahitatā tu yā // 21cd
SA20sthtvbhu:893: tasyeti paratantrasya pūrveṇeti parikalpitena tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:894: tathā hi tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakatvam avidyamānam eva parikalpyata iti parikalpitam ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:895: tena grāhyagrāhakeṇa paratantrasya sadā sarvakālam atyantarahitatā yā sa pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:896: ata eva sa naivānyo nānanyaḥ paratantrataḥ / 22ab
SA20sthtvbhu:897: ata eva sa naiveti parikalpitena svabhāvena paratantrasya sadā rahitatā pariniṣpannaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:899: sā ca dharmatā dharmān nānyā nānanyā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:900: pariniṣpannaś ca paratantradharmatety ataḥ paratantrāt pariniṣpanno nānyo nānanya iti boddhavyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:901: yadi hi pariniṣpannaḥ paratantrād anyaḥ syād evaṃ na parikalpitena paratantraḥ śūnyaḥ syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:902: athānanya evam api pariniṣpanno na viśuddhālambanaḥ syāt paratantravat saṃkleśātmakatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:903: evaṃ paratantraś ca na kleśātmakaḥ syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:907: nānyo nānanya iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / yathā hy anityatā duḥkhatānātmatā ca / saṃskārādibhyo
SA20sthtvbhu:911: athānanyā evam api saṃskārāḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvarūpāḥ syur anityatāvat /
SA20sthtvbhu:913: yadi grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitaḥ paratantraḥ katham asau gṛhyate agṛhyamāṇo vā katham astīti vijñāyate / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:915: nādṛṣṭe 'sminn iti pariniṣpannasvabhāve sa dṛśyata iti paratantraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:916: nirvikalpalokottarajñānadṛśye pariniṣpanne svabhāve adṛṣṭe apratividdhe asākṣātkṛte tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānagamyatvāt paratantro 'nyena jñānena na gṛhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:918: na punar lokottarajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhenāpi jñānena na dṛśyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:924: nirvikalpena jñānenākāśasamatayā tān sarvadharmān paśyatīti paratantradharmāṇāṃ tathatāmātradarśanāt //
SA20sthtvbhu:926: yadi dravyam eva paratantraḥ kathaṃ sūtre sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā anutpannā aniruddhā iti nirdiśyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:930: traya eva svabhāvā na caturtho 'stīti jñāpanārthaṃ saṃkhyānirdeśaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:931: svena svena lakṣaṇena vidyamānavad bhavatīti svbhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:932: trividhā niḥsvabhāvatā lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatā utpattiniḥsvabhāvatā paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:934: idānīṃ trividhasya svabhāvasya yā yasya niḥsvabhāvatā tāṃ tasya pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:937: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathatāpi saḥ / 25ab
SA20sthtvbhu:938: prathamaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo 'yaṃ ca lakṣaṇenaiva niḥsvabhāvas tallakṣaṇasyotprekṣitatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:941: ataś ca svarūpābhāvāt khapuṣpavat svarūpeṇaiva niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:945: ataś ca yathā prakhyāti tathāsyotpattir nāstīty ato 'syotpattiniḥsvabhāvatety ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:946: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathāpi sa iti / (25ab)
SA20sthtvbhu:947: paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ niruttaratvāt tasyārthaḥ paramārthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:948: atha vākāśavat sarvatraikarasārthena vaimalyāvikārārthena ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ paramārtha ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:949: sa yasmāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ paratantrātmakānāṃ paramārthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:950: taddharmateti kṛtvā tasmāt pariniṣpanna eva svabhāvaḥ paramārthaniḥsvabhāvātā pariniṣpannasyābhāvasvabhāvatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:951: kiṃ punaḥ paramārthābhidhānenaiva pariniṣpanno 'bhidhātavyaḥ / nety āha / kiṃ tarhi
SA20sthtvbhu:954: kiṃ tarhi yāvanto dharmadhātuparyāyāḥ sarvais tair apy abhidhātavya iti //
SA20sthtvbhu:957: tathā hi pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu sarvakālaṃ tathaiva bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:959: kiṃ punas tathatāvat pariniṣpanna eva vijñaptimātratā / utānyā vijñaptimātratā / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:963: nāmni tiṣṭhati tac cittaṃ tadā tanmātradarśanāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:964: nāmni sthānāc ca vijñaptāv upalambhaḥ prahīyate //
SA20sthtvbhu:967: iti / saiva vijñaptimātratety anena vacanenābhisamaya uktaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:968: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kasmāc cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān gṛhṇātīty asya bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:971: atha vā yās tāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitāḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:973: uktaṃ tasmāt kathaṃ prahāṇam aprahāṇaṃ cety ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:977: yāvac cittadharmatāyāṃ vijñaptimātrasaṃśabditāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate kiṃ tarhi grāhyagrāhakopalambhe carati /
SA20sthtvbhu:980: yāvad advayalakṣaṇe vijñaptimātratve yoginaś cittaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati tāvad grāhyagrāhakānuśayo na vinivartate na prahīyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:982: ato 'syaivam bhavaty ahaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ rūpādīn gṛhṇāmīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:983: idam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ kim artharahitacittamātropalambhāc cittadharmatāvasthānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:985: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhataḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:987: iti atha vā yaḥ punar ābhimānikaḥ śrutamātrakeṇa jānīyad ahaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ śuddhāyāṃ sthita iti tadgrahavyudāsārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:988: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhata ity (27ab)
SA20sthtvbhu:990: vijñaptimātram evedaṃ artharahitaṃ na bāhyo 'rtho 'stīty evam upalambhato grahaṇataḥ citrīkaraṇata ity artho 'grata ity abhimukhaṃ [Tvbh_136] sthāpayann iti yathāśrutaṃ manasā
SA20sthtvbhu:991: bahuprakāratvād yogācārālambanānāṃ kiṃcid ity āhāsthisaṃkalikaṃ vā vinīlakaṃ vā vipūyakaṃ vā vipaḍumakaṃ vā vyādhmātakādikaṃ vā tanmātre nāvatiṣṭhate vijñānopalambhāprahāṇāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:992: kadā punar vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ cittadharmātāyāñ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:993: yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā /
SA20sthtvbhu:995_0: yasmin kāle deśanālambanaṃ avavādālambanaṃ prākṛtaṃ vā rūpaśabdādyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:995_1: bahiś cittān nopalabhate na paśyati na gṛhṇāti nābhiniviśate yathābhūtārthadarśanān
SA20sthtvbhu:995_2: na tu jātyandhavat tasmin kāle vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:998: grāhye sati grāhako bhavati na tu grāhyābhāva iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1001: evaṃ hi [Tvbh_138] samasamālambyālambakaṃ nirvikalpaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:1002: grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśānuśayāḥ prahīyante svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:1003: yadaivaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati tadā kathaṃ vyapadiśyata ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1006: sa evānāsravo dhātur acintyaḥ kuśalo dhruvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1009: tad anena ślokadvayena darśanamārgam ārabhyottaraviśeṣagatyā phalasaṃpattir udbhāvitā vijñaptimātratāpraviṣṭayoginaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1013: anucitatvāl loke samudācārābhāvān nirvikalpatvāc ca lokād uttīrṇam iti
SA20sthtvbhu:1015: tasya jñānasyānantaraṃ āśrayasya parāvṛttir bhavatīti jñāpanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1018: tasya parāvṛttir yā dauṣṭhulyavipākadvayavāsanābhāvena nivṛttau satyāṃ karmaṇyatādharmakāyādvayajñānabhāvena parāvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1019: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ kasya prahāṇāt prāpyate / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1024: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ śrāvakādigatadauṣṭhulyahānitaś ca prāpyate yad āha vimuktikāya iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1027: dvidhā āvaraṇabhedena sottarā niruttarā cāśrayaparāvṛttir uktā /
SA20sthtvbhu:1030: sarvabījaṃ kleśabījaṃ bandhas tatra dvayor dvayoḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:1033: ādyasya kleśabījaṃ itarasya dvayāvaraṇabījaṃ tadudghātāt sarvajñatāvāptir bhavatīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1044: sukho nityatvād eva yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ ca nitya iti tasmāt sukhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1046: sa evāśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇo dharmākhyo 'py ucyate mahāmuner bhūmipāramitābhāvanayā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:1048: saṃsārāparityāgāt tadanupasaṃkleśatvād bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavibhutvalābhataś ca dharmakāya ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:1049: mahāmuner iti paramauneyayogād buddho bhagavān mahāmunir iti //
